scripts.build_all: tsc --out ./lib/IBJS.js ts/IBJS.ts ts/modules/cookies.ts ts/modules/validation.ts jQuery.d.ts | tsc --out ./lib/IBJS.essent.js ts/IBJS.essent.ts ts/modules/cookies.ts ts/modules/validation.ts jQuery.d.ts | tsc --out ./lib/IBJS.essent.UI.js ts/IBJS.essent.UI.ts jQuery.d.ts
scripts.build_IBJS_Essent: tsc --out ./lib/IBJS.essent.js ts/IBJS.essent.ts ts/modules/cookies.ts ts/modules/validation.ts jQuery.d.ts typings.d.ts
